author: Jonathan Mills
comment: Edit: time remaining now fits on the screen. Great work. Original review follows: On my moto360, the text doesn't fit in on the card preview, so I don't see the last digit of the minutes remaining. And when the vibration occurs, the card still says "one minute remaining" for another minute or so. But other than that, works as advertised.

reply.author: BonySoft
reply.content:
Hi! Just published an update (1.1.1) fixing the issues you reported. 
Many thanks for your feedbacks, if you are happy with the app. please feel free to rate it 5 stars ;)

title: Works well

author: Joe Orr
comment: Good functionality, interface could be better. The vibrate function in this app is too long for my taste.  It would be nice if there was a settings portion where I could change the vibrate to one short burst like other apps, instead of the 3 long loud vibrates it does now.

author: Claudia Alvis
comment: THIS IS THE BEST! I would gladly pay for more features though.  Not only it it works flawlessly.  This tiny app sets the long and the short breaks automatically and continually.  My favorite thing is that there's no need to keep tapping Start like most Pomodoro apps and even PC apps. That is super useful to hopeless procrastinators because I can't extend my 5 minute break. I have to rush to keep working on my Pomodoro, which is already running. Genius!    It could have more features though. Like a PC/phone companion to log the pomodoros, customization to set the Pomodoro blocks, data export/import, Dropbox/Drive compatibility, etc.  Great job!

author: Vasily Artyukhov
comment: I've tested a few pomo apps for Wear and this is by far the most convenient one. However now I realize that the standard 25/5 timing is too short for me so I want to change it. If there is a settings menu in this app it's too well hidden. Looks like until it's there I'll have to switch to another app :( Other feature that would make this a 5+ app would be automatic start/stop on schedule. But, regardless of anything, thanks for this awesome app!
title: Want to be able to change pomo duration

author: nick bowers
comment: On my moto 360 2nd gen its been sat on 20 minutes for about 10 minutes now... Also it crashed the watch when initially installed
Would give it 5 stars if there was a way of configuring the duration of the pomodoros.
title: works well

author: Kevin Lai
comment: App doesn't work on Huawei Watch running Android Wear 2.0

author: Ateeb Ahmed
comment: The app is no longer working on my moto 360 2nd gen

author: Jonathan Boyko
comment: It's great. Unfortunately, it doesn't seem to work with Android Wear 2.0.

author: Джамшед Махкамзода
comment: When you add config options, I'll give you 5 stars.

author: Michael Shick
comment: I adore the simplicity and the fact that it runs independently on the watch.

author: Zohar Elbaz
comment: I like the idea but i wish that you could add a settings screen so i could put the duration of my work day

author: Gelo Goloy
comment: It works and vibrates after every phase. I just wish it would pause in between phases and start counting down  only when you've decided to start the work/rest phase. Good job so far though!

author: Beatrice Gatta
comment: I have chronic fatigue so i can only work in very short bursts or I faint. If I could set the timer to 10 minutes work / 3 minutes break or 5 minutes work/1minute break it would be perfect. This app needs custom timers as other users already pointed out. It's one of the most requested features and I  hope it gets added soon!
title: Needs custom time
